required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Characteristics and Outcome of Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) in Egypt
clinical_study.official_title: Characteristics and Outcome of COVID-19 Among Egyptian Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The World Health Organization (WHO) has recently declared coronavirus disease 2019 (Covid-19) a public health emergency of international concern. Egypt is one of the countries that has been infected by Covid-19. The characteristics of clinical presentation, laboratory and radiological data are not yet studied. Outcomes of covid-19 in Egypt also have not been described yet.

detailed_description.textblock:
Patients admitted to Assiut University hospital, Al Rajhi liver hospital and other covid-19 Quarantine hospitals will be included. The characteristics of patients will be described such as demographic data; age, sex,history of contact to COVID-19 patients or traveling abroad and their clinical manifestation such as fever,cough,shortness of breath, sore throat, diarrhea. Laboratory data will also be included such as blood picture,D-Dimer, serum ferritin, creatinine, liver enzymes, oxygen saturation and covid-19 polymerase chain reaction (PCR). Radiological data will be described as regarding chest X-ray and/or computed tomography.
Patients will be followed until complications, improvement, transfer to another hospital or death and their outcome will be described.

primary_outcome.measure: Demographics of Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) in the cohort group
primary_outcome.description: Sheet recording age, sex, co-morbidity,history of contact

primary_outcome.measure: Laboratory data of included Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) cohort
Radiological features of Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) cohort

secondary_outcome.measure: outcomes of Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) infection in the cohort group
secondary_outcome.description: Data recording of the outcomes of treatment

arm_group.description: Patients with clinical presentation and confirmed as Covid-19 according to the definition of Egyptian Ministry of Health

intervention.description: Follow up to assess the outcome until complications, improvement, death or being transferred to another quarantine hospital.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with clinical presentation and confirmed as Covid-19 according to the definition of Egyptian Ministry of Health.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with diagnosis of Covid-19 .
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients refuse to participate in the study

responsible_party.investigator_title: Lecturer of Tropical Medicine and Gastroenterology

patient_data.ipd_description: The data prescribed in the study
